title: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
description: A Civil Engineering degree from Kennesaw State prepares you for planning, designing, and constructing structures essential to modern life like buildings, bridges, roads, pipelines, canals, dams, airports, and railways. The Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering degree program teaches you the basic engineering principles, how to plan and manage construction projects, and to bring into consideration the many associated systems and resources that can impact the project.
careers: CAD Technician, Building Engineer, Urban Planner
school: Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering
